title: Piltover Customs Heimerdinger name too big
body:
As seen in the image here, Piltover Customs {{champion:74}} 's name is too large for the loading screen, in that it overlaps the borders on both sides (more-so the right than the left). It probably just needs to be slightly re-sized and re-centered, but it bugged (lolpuns) me, so I thought I'd report it.

Thanks!

replies.body:
Hey Kritty,

Thanks for the report! We do have a couple instances where longer names don't have the best fit. IIRC, Queen of Diamonds Syndra is the same way. At this time, it's working as intended.
why not make the name "Heimy of Piltover Customs" the name would be shorter and also adorable <3

Totally agree! That doesn't solve for other regions, though, who have much longer names, and shortening it to Heimy likely wouldn't fix the issue. :c There are also other egregious names, such as Guardian of the Sands Fiddlesticks.

hey if you can fix the problem for one skin even if for just one region its still a small step towards getting the bigger problem fixed.  also give Heimy a try after all we'll never know if no one tries c:
